reviewText: Klown Kamp Massacre is a low bubget Troma slasher flick. But its still an enjoyable slasher flick. And when was the last time you saw a slasher flick with clowns in it.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Klown Kamp Massacre is a pretty disappointing slasher movie. There is some awesomeness contained within, but it's mostly just stoopid. And the ending is just wetarded.

reviewText: A movie made with the intention of being horrible it meets this goal with flying colors! It is stupid, needlessly violent, perverted, disgusting and hilarious! You have to have a taste for this kind of thing already if you expect to like it but if you do then you should REALLY like it! I certainly do. One of my favorite movies.
Title: N/A

reviewText: What is more horrible than buying a movie and not liking it? Buying one that does NOT play! Buyer beware of Klown Kamp Massacre! It will kill your enthusiasm for purchasing from Amazon. On top of the movie not playing in my DVD player, that is wasted money I could of given to my church or the food bank. Horrible experience, plain and simple!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is actually an above-average B-movie. Troma fans should love it, the script is actually quite good. A fun and funny movie.
